items.content_html: React Maintenance is a lightweight React component that helps developers easily enable maintenance mode for their applications. It supports customizable maintenance screens, IP-based access control, and environment-based toggling (e.g., production mode). Perfect for ensuring a smooth user experience during application updates or downtime.
items.title: tirth-gaudani/react-maintenance: React Maintenance is a lightweight React component that helps developers easily enable maintenance mode for their applications. It supports customizable maintenance screens, IP-based access control, and environment-based toggling (e.g., production mode). Perfect for ensuring a smooth user experience during application updates or downtime.

items.content_html: A fully responsive and lightweight weather web app built using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, powered by WeatherAPI.com. Users can search for any city and instantly get updated weather conditions including temperature, weather description, humidity, wind speed, and a matching weather icon.
items.title: Hsiwjys/weather-app: A fully responsive and lightweight weather web app built using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, powered by WeatherAPI.com. Users can search for any city and instantly get updated weather conditions including temperature, weather description, humidity, wind speed, and a matching weather icon.

items.content_html: got-scraping-client is a lightweight and efficient tool for web scraping tasks using the popular Got HTTP client. It simplifies data extraction from web pages by providing a straightforward API and built-in support for handling common challenges like pagination and rate limiting.
